message: Hi Name,

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, Requests and Forms as Modern as the Evidence You Seek. We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
Hi Name,
You recently registered for Requests and Forms as Modern as the Evidence You Seek, but weren’t able to join us. We missed having you with us on presentation day.
Would you mind taking a few moments to tell us why you were unable to attend this webinar?
Your feedback matters as we continue to improve Justia Webinars and plan future events for Justia Connect members. Our team appreciates it more than you know.

Registration is now open for the next Justia Webinar: Requests and Forms as Modern as the Evidence You Seek.* On Friday, June 9 at 3:00 p.m. ET/12:00 p.m. PT, Craig Ball, Trial Lawyer & Computer Forensic Examiner, will discuss ways you can move beyond standard discovery practices and revamp your requests to target electronic evidence.

message: Hi Name,

Are you tired of outdated and inefficient discovery practices that drain your law firm’s resources without effectively advancing the litigation process? It is time to embrace the power of modern
e-discovery technique.

Join us for an exclusive webinar in which
e-discovery expert Craig Ball will share invaluable insights and strategies to help modernize your discovery requests and secure discoverable evidence in useful forms while helping your bottom line. The details are below:

Date: Friday, June 9, 2023
Time: 3:00 p.m. ET/12:00 p.m. PT
Where: Virtually via Justia Connect 
Duration: 60 Minutes
CLE Credit: California*
message3: Please note: All Justia Connect members are invited to join us for this free presentation but only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive CLE credit for their attendance. To upgrade to Pro for only $19.99/month, visit connect.justia.com/pro.
*This presentation is approved for one hour of General MCLE credit in California.

message: Hi Name,

We wanted to remind you that you are registered for our upcoming Justia Webinar: Requests and Forms as Modern as the Evidence You Seek.* The presentation will begin on Friday, June 9 promptly at 3:00 p.m. ET/12:00 p.m. PT.
On presentation day, you can come back to this email and use this link to join us. If you have trouble accessing this presentation, please contact Justia Support for assistance.

Reminder: While all Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive CLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.

Name,
Just a quick reminder that Requests and Forms as Modern as the Evidence You Seek* is happening next week!

Accept our invitation to this presentation, and you’ll get a fresh approach to the traditional work of discovery in the litigation process, including tips on how to craft practical and proportionate discovery requests targeted at modern communication and information technology.

Hi Name,

Last call for registrations! Requests and Forms as Modern as the Evidence You Seek* is happening tomorrow. At 3:00 p.m. ET/12:00 p.m. PT, Craig Ball, Trial Lawyer & Computer Forensic Examiner, will share his expertise in the art of crafting effective e-discovery requests that both protect your bottom line and target discoverable information that could impact your case.

This presentation is free for all lawyers who have activated their Justia Connect membership by claiming their Justia Lawyer Directory profile. However, free CLE credit is only available for Justia Connect Pros. You can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro by visiting connect.justia.com/pro.
note: *This presentation is approved for one hour of General MCLE credit in California.

message: Name,
Requests and Forms as Modern as the Evidence You Seek* begins promptly at 3:00 p.m. ET/12:00 p.m. PT today.
Use this link to join us anytime after 2:50 p.m. ET. If you have trouble accessing this presentation, please contact Justia Support for assistance.
Reminders:
bullet-list: This presentation is free for all Justia Connect members.
Only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible for free CLE credit. If you are seeking credit for this presentation, you must first upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.

Justia Connect Pro members wishing to earn CLE credit must both attend the entirety of this presentation and complete verification via the Justia CLE Center within 48 hours of the presentation’s conclusion.

message: Hi Name,

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 1:00 p.m. PT on Sunday, June 11, 2023 to receive credit.
Completing Your Attendance Verification
number-list: Visit the Justia CLE Center: https://connect.justia.com/cle-center
Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the MCLE presentation.
Download your certificate, and you’re done!
note: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.
